scripts.start:dev: NODE_ENV=development nohup node src/server.js > server.log 2>&1 & echo $! > server.pid && echo 'Server started in background (PID: '$!')'
scripts.stop:dev: if [ -f server.pid ]; then kill $(cat server.pid) && rm server.pid server.log && echo 'Server stopped'; else echo 'Server not running'; fi
scripts.test:report: curl -X POST 'http://localhost:8080/api/wordpress-report' -H 'Authorization: Bearer dev-secret-key-change-in-production' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d @reporter.sample.json | jq .
scripts.dev:setup: npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run start:dev
scripts.dev:teardown: npm run stop:dev && npm run docker:down
